mmt_image
Class MMTImage

java.lang.Object
  mmt_image.MMTImage

public class MMTImage
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for holding gray scale image data.

Constructor Summary
MMTImage(int width, int height)
          creates an image and allocates memory

getSubPicture

public MMTImage getSubPicture(int xstart,
                              int ystart,
                              int width,
                              int height)
Returns a piece of the original image starting at xstart, ystart with width and height in pixel.
The startpoint is in the left upper corner.

Parameters:
xstart - int, startpoint x
ystart - int, startpoint y
width - int, width of subpicture
height - int, height of subpicture
Returns:
MMTImage, the subpicture

getAbs

public int[] getAbs()
returns a new array of the absolute values of all pixels. the original pixels stay the same

Returns:
int[]

getLimited_0_255

public int[] getLimited_0_255()
returns a new array of the pixels. the pixels are limited from 0 to 255.
pixels less than 0 are set to zero.
pixels greater than 255 are set to 255
other pixels stay the same.

Returns:
int[]

setAllPixels

public void setAllPixels(int value)
sets all pixels to the give value.

Parameters:
value - int

getMin

public int getMin()
returns the smallest value of all pixels.

Returns:
int

getMax

public int getMax()
returns the maximum value of all pixels

Returns:
int
